newsitem.title: USA: Consolidated Eco creates employee buy plan.
newsitem.headline: Consolidated Eco creates employee buy plan.

text.p: Consolidated Eco-Systems Inc said Thursday that its board approved the creation of a company assisted market purchase program to help employees buy its stock in open market transactions.
Consolidated Eco-Systems, a diversified technology and service company providing technical solutions for projects such as hazardous waste cleanup services, said it believes its stock is undervalued.

"Employee ownership is very important to Consolidated Eco. Company management believes that our stock is extremely undervalued at the present time. Many members of management and their families have been taking advantage of this opportunity through open market purchases," the company said in a statement.
It said the program would not increase the number of its outstanding common shares.
